reviewText: I've lost track of how many times I've seen this excellent survey of the royal residences and the history there occurred therein. Sir Huw gives a wonderful commentary as he takes us to Buckingham Palance, the Tower of London, Windsor Castle, Hampton Court, and many others, including the royal yacht Britannia. Well researched and well executed, "Treasures of the British Crown" entertains as it instructs. I'll be ordering a new copy myself very soon!
